definition: to resign/to dismiss/to decline/to take leave/ballad (archaic poetic genre)/variant of 詞|词[ci2]
surname Ren/Ren County 任縣|任县[Ren2 Xian4] in Hebei

to assign/to appoint/to take up a post/office/responsibility/to let/to allow/to give free rein to/no matter (how, what etc)/classifier for terms served in office, or for spouses, girlfriends etc (as in 前任男友)

sentences.english: Article 66 The trustee of a public trust must not resign without the approval of the regulatory agency of public undertakings.
sentences.chinese: 信託的受託人未經公益事業管理機構批准，不得辭任。

sentences.english: Where there are other provisions in this Law governing the resignation of the trustee of a public welfare trust, those provisions shall prevail.
sentences.chinese: 本法對公益信託的受託人辭任另有規定的，從其規定。

sentences.english: After standing down as the chairman of the company, he will stay as an advisor.
sentences.chinese: 辭任公司主席後，他會留下來作顧問。
